   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(mnesia_external_backend_test).
   22: 
   23: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   24:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   25:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   26: 
   27: -export([
   28:     conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart/1,
   29:     backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend/1
   30: ]).
   31: 
   32: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   33: 
   34: -record(some_rec, {some_id :: atom(), some_int :: number(), some_string :: string()}).
   35: 
   36: all() -> [
   37:     conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart,
   38:     backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend
   39: ].
   40: 
   41: groups() ->
   42:     [].
   43: 
   44: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   45:     file:delete(ext_test_server:tab_to_filename(table)),
   46:     file:delete("bup0.BUP"),
   47:     file:delete("bup1.BUP"),
   48:     file:delete("bup2.BUP"),
   49:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   50: 
   51: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   52:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   53: 
   54: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,1}]}]}].
   61: 
   62: conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   63:     Node = node(),
   64:     Data = [
   65:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "something" },
   66:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "anything"  },
   67:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "everything"},
   68:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "nothing"   }
   69:     ],
   70: 
   71:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
   72:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
   73:         {type, ordered_set},
   74:         {record_name, some_rec},
   75:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
   76:         {disc_copies, [Node]}
   77:     ])),
   78: 
   79:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   80:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data)
   81:     end)),
   82: 
   83:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, ext_ram_copies)),
   84:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   85:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   86:     )),
   87: 
   88:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, disc_copies)),
   89:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   90:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   91:     )),
   92: 
   93:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
   94:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
   95:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 10000)),
   96: 
   97:     ?match(Data, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   98:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   99:     )).
  100: 
  101: backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     Node = node(),
  103:     Data1 = [
  104:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "1"},
  105:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"},
  106:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "3"}
  107:     ],
  108:     Data2 = [
  109:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "4"},
  110:         #some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"},
  111:         #some_rec{some_id = f, some_int = 6, some_string = "6"}
  112:     ],
  113: 
  114:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  115:     mnesia:set_debug_level(debug),
  116:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
  117:         {type, set},
  118:         {record_name, some_rec},
  119:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
  120:         {ext_disc_only_copies, [Node]}
  121:     ])),
  122: 
  123:     % ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(table, #some_rec.some_int)).
  124:     % ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})),
  125:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup0.BUP")),
  126: 
  127:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  128:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data1)
  129:     end)),
  130:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup1.BUP")),
  131: 
  132:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  133:     %     lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data2)
  134:     % end)),
  135:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup2.BUP")),
  136: 
  137:     % ?match(true, ets:whereis(table) =/= undefined),
  138:     % ?match(ok, load_backup("bup0.BUP")).
  139:     % ?match(true, ets:whereis(table) =/= undefined),
  140:     % ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})).
  141:     % [] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  142: 
  143:     ?match(ok, load_backup("bup1.BUP")),
  144:     Expected1 = sets:from_list(Data1),
  145:     ?match(Expected1, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))).
  146:     % [#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  147: 
  148:     % ?match(ok, load_backup("bup2.BUP")),
  149:     % Expected2 = sets:from_list(lists:append(Data1, Data2)),
  150:     % ?match(Expected2, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))).
  151:     % [#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  152:     % [#some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 5, #some_rec.some_int).
  153: 
  154: load_backup(BUP) ->
  155:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(BUP)),
  156:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  157:     timer:sleep(3000),
  158:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  159:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 5000)),
  160:     ok.
